column1: Mary is a teacher in a primary school.
John is a handsome old man.
He is a stupid guy.
I am a doctorate student at the University of London.
You are poor.
They are mad at you.
I feel cold.
She plays badminton very well.
Robert eats cookies everyday.
The college students dance on popular songs only.
I hit him everyday.
We write English poems for a literary website on Sundays.
Probably, they give all the money to the gangster.
I want to study.
This plan looks too good to be true.
You earn a lot of money.
I wish I were a successful businessman.
He is surviving on college scholarship.
I am doing the dishes today.
You are cleaning your untidy bedroom.
You are supposed to stay at home during weekends.
All of them are acting strangely.
They are planning to buy a new house in the old city towards the year end.
She is thinking of getting married to her long time boyfriend.
I am coming home now.
John is staring at Mary.
Please put the red flowers in the vase on time.
Kindly be quite for a while.
Don't keep me waiting.
Don't buy new clothes for now.
I don't want to study.
She is not a thief.
They are not helping you actually.
You are not thinking straight.
She could not sleep all day.
They must not behave like this.
Sarah will not forgive you.
One day, I will meet the girl of my dreams.
Sam will take care of her mom.
I will be doing my homework during summer vacations.
Sarah completed all the work herself.
The train arrived a little late as usual.
Sam grew old to be a great father.
The clouds looked clear that day.
I hit him yesterday.
The sheep ran away.
The school kids got off the bus.
You can turn off the lights.
She should wait for her friends before leaving.
I must help the needy.
Sam could drink 2 litres of water as a teenager.
There must be an error in this code.
They were talking about the world health issues in the meeting at the main building.
Perhaps I was a bit too interested in your proposal at that time.
Frankly, our chances were slim.
Predictably, the game was really difficult.
Robert and Martha are old friends.
Robert and Martha gave their clothes to Sam.
I like Robert and Martha
I have two dogs and one cat.
Sam will paint the furniture and Alex will repair the wooden cupboards.
We all like chocolate ice-cream and vanilla milkshake.
The teacher went home when nobody came to the class.
The boy likes the girl who wears spectacles.
The person who is the smartest in the class came to meet us.
I know everyone who bunks classes.
I will meet you where the cars are parked.
I bought the table which you saw in the market.
We see the stars that are the brightest in the sky.
I think that you do not like me.
I will tell you how it is done.
I will give you the packet when we meet.
Whenever there is a problem, she helps me.
Although I never told her, she understood everything.
If you go to the market, bring some eggs.
If he comes late at home, I will talk to him.
I ate the pasta because I was hungry.
Nobody turned up for the class because of which the teacher got upset.
I have been waiting here since morning.
You are saying this since you know me.
Mary could not meet him as she was not home at that time.
John slapped him in order to teach him a lesson.
Atop the main building in the heart of the Rome lies a big golden dome.
We distributed packets consisting of sugar candies.
The young lady got lost in the jungle while searching for her brother.
